school.name: St. Joseph's Degree and PG College, Hyd

profile_positions.description:
- Ensure high quality standards for interviewing and hiring employees at all levels of the organization.
- Drive appropriate data oriented analysis, adoption of technology solutions and process improvement projects to achieve operational and business goals.
- Work with internal Amazon teams/vendors to improve operational aspects of their business in providing a great consumer experience.
- Execute and make plans to deliver business metrics; analyze data, highlight trends/gaps and report key metrics whenever required.
- Launch new process and define goals; own and drive process metrics.
- Set/manage operational goals across teams every quarter.
- Guide SOP creation/update and ensure a best practice sharing environment across the team/node/regions.
- Drive productivity increase and process streamlining by building an innovation – driven environment.
- To ensure customer satisfaction - receive feedback from internal customers.
- New requests/onboardings – to provide inputs and validate the HC need, time and scoping.
- Training and mentoring new hires - build launch plans and work with the training team on evaluating their performance during ramp-up period.
- Own metrics and process reviews with internal and external stakeholders, as well as providing support in business reviews with senior stakeholders.
- Performance management – to address performance and training needs, on-time feedback, rewards & recognition, facilitate development and encourage proactive self-development.
- Quality Audits- maintain 100% quality score across team. Create audit parameters for all processes based on the customer/process impact.
- Conduct deep dive analysis on the handled issues and publish recommendations and action plans based on data to prevent future failure.
- Collaborating with the Training department in order to create/maintain dedicated training for new joiners and identify workshop and refresher training needs for teams.
profile_positions.title: RBS Subject Matter Expert

profile_positions.description:
- Perform internal and external audit of data for accuracy and integrity. 
- Prepared and shared the monthly team performance with the managers providing the quality score and health of the process by analyzing the audited data. Also, providing with potential growth areas and solutions to improve the performance. 
- Lead monthly sessions with the team to share the monthly performance along with the major growth areas identified during the audits and discuss the concerns and issues led to such errors. 
- Provide individual feedbacks to the bottom quartile performers and work with them to improve the performance. 
- Provided refresher training, educate, and mentor internal team members on tools and resources for adoption within daily work based on quality trends identified. 
- Responsible for root cause analysis on the external escalations by performing dive deep research and analyzing the situation and also providing the solutions to avoid errors in future. 
- Track, measure and report quality metrics at different intervals to ascertain the process performance health and identify improvement areas. 
- Established the audit parameters for the quality score based on the critical and non-critical impact. 
- Responsible for allocation of audit sample to the auditors from the total transactions performed by team on a daily basis. 
- Connect with stake holders to discuss the loopholes in the process and find a solution to improve the process quality. 
- Work with employees and also maintained successful partnerships with Employee Benefits. Administer leaves in compliance with federal and state leave of absence laws and Amazon policies.
profile_positions.title: HR-Quality Analyst

profile_positions.description:
- SME in Leave and Accommodation processes, policies to support establish learning platforms to constantly improve processes and compliance for service delivery for a frustration-free experience.
- Responsible for work allocation to peers based on priority and staff availability.
- Shared the SLA metrics with stakeholders on a daily basis.
-Responsible to share the productivity details of individual on a bi-weekly basis.
- Created SOP’s of the processes for the team’s reference and new hires.
- Responsible for training and mentoring ~74 employees across Hyderabad and Onsite training to Bangalore, India teams along with cross-training counter parts in Seattle and Costa Rica.
- Conduct and lead team huddles to understand the loopholes, process gaps or any concerns related to the process, tools or resources.
- Performed internal audits on weekly basis to for data accuracy and integrity.
- Shared error trends with the team and provided the potential solutions to improve the process.
profile_positions.title: HR Assistant II

profile_positions.description:
- HRMS data management and support HR process for the US region.
- Responsible for maintaining a successful entry of data verification and entry into HRIS and LOAA systems, timekeeping systems,
and payroll and pay information from our third-party administrators (TPAs).
- Providing data, information and verification related to the workflow of leave of absence processes required for claim management.
- Verify data and perform data entry. Look for variances and discrepancies in data for correction.
- Submitting any corrections needed through Trouble Ticketing, SharePoint and defect log tracking in consultation with the SME.
- Communicating to leads/managers on data findings and escalations.
- Findings matches with data information in the system for the right outcome.
- Ensuring data standards and integrity procedures.
profile_positions.title: HR Assistant
